actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to require that certain members of the Armed Forces discharged for service-connected disabilities before the taking effect of the Career Compensation Act of 1949 be provided transportation on military aircraft on a space-available basis.

summary.text: Requires that members of the Armed Forces discharged for service-connected disabilities of 30 percent or more before the taking effect of the Career Compensation Act of 1949 be provided transportation on military aircraft on a space-available basis.

titles.title: A bill to require that certain members of the Armed Forces discharged for service-connected disabilities before the taking effect of the Career Compensation Act of 1949 be provided transportation on military aircraft on a space-available basis.
